updates.title: Revised Syllabus for BSc.CSIT - Academic Year 2025
updates.description: The Central Department of CSIT has released the revised syllabus for BSc.CSIT program effective from Academic Year 2025. Major updates include addition of AI/ML courses and modern web frameworks.

updates.title: Admission Open for MSc.CSIT 2025 Batch
updates.description: Applications are now open for MSc.CSIT program for the academic year 2025. Interested candidates can apply through the university portal before November 15, 2025.

updates.title: Workshop on Machine Learning - November 2025
updates.description: Department is organizing a 3-day workshop on Machine Learning and Deep Learning from November 20-22, 2025. All students are encouraged to participate.

updates.title: Examination Schedule for Semester End Exams
updates.description: The examination schedule for all programs has been published. Students can download the routine from the department notice board or university website.

updates.title: New Computer Lab Inauguration
updates.description: The department has inaugurated a new state-of-the-art computer lab equipped with latest hardware and software for students' practical learning.

updates.title: Research Paper Publication Guidelines
updates.description: Guidelines for MSc.CSIT students regarding research paper publication and thesis submission have been updated. Please check the department website for details.

updates.title: Industry Visit to Tech Companies - Kathmandu
updates.description: Department is organizing an industry visit for final year students to leading tech companies in Kathmandu. Registration deadline: September 25, 2025.

updates.title: BIT Program Curriculum Update
updates.description: Minor updates have been made to the BIT program curriculum, focusing on practical aspects of cloud computing and DevOps practices.
